meanings.sent1: The garden had a seminatural look with a mix of wildflowers and carefully planted shrubs.
meanings.sent2: The artist created a seminatural landscape painting that blended realistic elements with imaginative touches.
meanings.sent3: The seminatural hair color of the character in the movie made them stand out in a funny way.
meanings.sent4: Her seminatural talent for storytelling was like a hidden gem waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent5: The seminatural scent of the candle brought back memories of hiking in the woods.

meanings.definition: Having some natural characteristics; not completely artificial.
meanings.sent1: The seminatural flavor of the juice came from using real fruits and a hint of sweetness.
meanings.sent2: The seminatural fabric of the dress was soft to the touch and breathable.
meanings.sent3: The seminatural appearance of the robot made it seem like a quirky invention from a science fiction movie.
meanings.sent4: Her smile had a seminatural charm that captivated everyone in the room.
meanings.sent5: The seminatural glow of the sunset painted the sky in hues of orange and pink.
